item.title: Comment on New maps, gameplay, features and chat – the next evolution of Tower Storm is finally here by Alessandro Rossetti
item.dc:creator: Alessandro Rossetti
item.description: Hi, i find your name really nice but creating a lobby it's often problematic! There are other bugs, after a 25 minutes game, the game freezed giving the error bad subscription key analyzing it. Is it an opensource project? What did you used to make it?
item.content:encoded:
Hi, i find your name really nice but creating a lobby it’s often problematic!
There are other bugs, after a 25 minutes game, the game freezed giving the error bad subscription key analyzing it.
Is it an opensource project? What did you used to make it?

item.title: Comment on Splash by towerstorm
item.dc:creator: towerstorm
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/splash/#comment-47">!!!!!!</a>.
Oh I see what you mean, for some reason It's not appearing on Nathans posts. I'll look into it. Can you see the like button on the left hand side along with the tweet / g+ buttons?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to !!!!!!.

Oh I see what you mean, for some reason It’s not appearing on Nathans posts. I’ll look into it. Can you see the like button on the left hand side along with the tweet / g+ buttons?

Do you mean you don't like it? Or that you can't click the like button?
item.content:encoded:

Do you mean you don’t like it? Or that you can’t click the like button?

item.title: Comment on Tutorial available, crash bugs fixed and gameplay balanced by !!!!!!
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/tutorial-available-crash-bugs-fixed-and-gameplay-balanced/#comment-42">!!!!!!</a>.
Thanks now working. :)

item.title: Comment on Tutorial available, crash bugs fixed and gameplay balanced by Solace
item.dc:creator: Solace
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/tutorial-available-crash-bugs-fixed-and-gameplay-balanced/#comment-42">!!!!!!</a>.
Hey thanks for letting us know. Looks like all 3 game servers either crashed or ran out of memory in the last day. I've fixed this now and am in the process of adding more monitors to detect when the game isn't working.
Thanks, Tim
item.content:encoded:
In reply to !!!!!!.

Hey thanks for letting us know. Looks like all 3 game servers either crashed or ran out of memory in the last day. I’ve fixed this now and am in the process of adding more monitors to detect when the game isn’t working.

Thanks, Tim

item.title: Comment on Why the hell did we choose Firefox OS over Android and iPhone? by Maitreya Vyas
item.dc:creator: Maitreya Vyas

item.title: Comment on Tower Storm 0.3 patch preview by jansky
item.dc:creator: jansky
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/tower-storm-0-3-patch-preview/#comment-40">towerstorm</a>.
Not really. Having played the new version of Tower Storm (I am a friend of Kevin), I can say it's definitely better than V1, but sometimes it's nice to go back. I will say that I like the minions in V1 a bit more than in V2, but that's just my opinion.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to towerstorm.

Not really. Having played the new version of Tower Storm (I am a friend of Kevin), I can say it’s definitely better than V1, but sometimes it’s nice to go back. I will say that I like the minions in V1 a bit more than in V2, but that’s just my opinion.
